definitions.definition: An emotional and physical intimate relationship which includes a common living place and which exists without legal or religious sanction.
A place where two or more individuals reside together.
The act of two species living together in the same habitat .
Cooperation between politicians of opposing political parties; especially, in France, between a President and Prime Minister.

main_definition: An emotional and physical intimate relationship which includes a common living place and which exists without legal or religious sanction.
secondary_definitions: A place where two or more individuals reside together.
( biology ) The act of two species living together in the same habitat .
( politics ) Cooperation between politicians of opposing political parties; especially, in France, between a President and Prime Minister.
